title: Are old Little Golden Books worth anything? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are to me! I remember how much fun my son and I had reading them… our copy of “The Tawny Scrawny Lion” had an entire corner chewed off and I said my son had a taste for fine literature. He he he.. but yeah, like how many do you have and what condition do you consider them to be? Good, fair, medium, awful, disgusting - I’ll check Ebay, but there are other places that will buy them from you, provided they are in respectable shape. Do you have a collection or just a few?
